data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Olancho, Honduras.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Olancho, Honduras
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Olancho, Honduras to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 159,085 believers in Olancho, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 159,085 believers find a person of peace today among the 419,914 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Turk people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Olancho. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Olancho, Honduras so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Olancho, Honduras. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Olancho
location.cities_list: Juticalpa, Campamento, San Francisco de la Paz, Santa María del Real, Gualaco
location.cities_list_w_pop: Juticalpa (33,686), Campamento (6,560), San Francisco de la Paz (5,411), Santa María del Real (4,587), Gualaco (3,601)
